In connec tion with ray application for a license to prospect for oil at Gwadur* I of course quite understand that there must be many points to consider and shall be glad to hear further from you when you are in a posi tion to gire me any definite news* Z wonder if the enclosed Prospecting License Form which is v Z think, the latest Gorernjient standard form would be of any interest to youl Zf you hare not got a copy it might perhaps be of some assistance if you haye to prepare a similar document in eyent of our application being granted* Yours sincerely 9 Major S«G* Knox, C*Z«3«j British Political Resident in the Persian Gulf 9 ULfJLLJLlt. location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with wash on tracing cloth.Dimensions:275 x 290 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures.Map is lettered for reference with a key and explanatory note provided in accompanying text (folio 34).The area over which a prospecting license is required by the Burmah Oil Company Limited is coloured pink.Shows the Agency House and Telegraph Office in Gwadar, with telegraph cable indicated by dotted line.
